content: मंदर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Slow, tardy, dull. {@--2@} Thick, dense; firm. {@--3@} Large, bulky. --रः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of a mountain (used by the gods and demons as a churningstick when they churned the ocean for nectar); पृषतैर्मदरोद्धूतैः क्षारोमेय हवाच्युतं <ls>R. 4. 27</ls>; अभिनवजलसुदर धृतमदर ए <ls>Gīt. 1.</ls> शोभैव मंदरक्षब्धक्षुभेतांभोधिवर्णना <ls>Śi. 2. 107</ls>; <ls>Ki. 5. 30.</ls> {@--2@} A necklace of pearls (of 8 or 16 strings). {@--3@} Heaven. {@--4@} A mirror. {@--5@} One of the five trees in Indra's paradise; see मंदार. --रं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Slowly, sluggishly.
